name: KIMBERLY FRAZIER
resume_snippet: KIMBERLY FRAZIER  SKILLS / SPECIAL QUALIFICATIONS:  Thirty years of experience in FDA, EPA and OECD GLP Compliance with pharmaceutical and contract research organizations. Areas of expertise include preclinical toxicology, bioanalytical and analytical chemistry, environmental analysis, regulatory inspections (including remediation), vendor and facility audits and animal welfare compliance.  Regulatory Expertise:  Audits, Bioanalytical Labs, Clinical Labs, EPA GLP, FDA GLP, OECD GLP, GLP (Animal)
